monogr.title: Large letters : Three in number, containing much necessarie matter, for the intruction and comfort of such, as are distressed in conscience by feeling of sinne, and feare of Gods wrath. Written heeretofore by T. W. for some deare friends of his, and now published and printe for the raising vp of such as labor vnder the heauie burthen of an affected spirite
monogr.author: T. W. (Thomas Wilcox)

div.head: To the Christian Reader.
div.p: I beseech thee (good reader) pardō these scapes committed, & amend with thy pen, these faults following, or whatsoeuer thou, according to the iudgment and light that thou hast receiued, shalt find amisse herein.
